info.description: This is the Thunder Compute API server for managing compute resources and GPU workloads.
info.title: Thunder Compute API

get.description: Get a list of user's compute instances

post.description: Add a new SSH key to an existing instance for access
Delete a compute instance by ID
Modify a running compute instance's resources

get.description: Retrieve current hourly pricing information for compute resources

post.description: Create a new snapshot from a running instance

get.description: Get a list of all snapshots for the authenticated user's organization
Get available thunder templates for instance creation

post.description: Create a new named API token for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a named API token for the authenticated user
Delete multiple named API tokens for the authenticated user in a single request
